mapper.insert: insert into g_category (CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PARENT_ID, KEYWORDS, CATY_DESC, SORT_ORL, IS_SHOW_IN_NAV, GRADE, FILTER_ATTR, IS_SHOW, IS_ENABLED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY ) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortOrl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isShowInNav,jdbcType=BIT}, #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{filterAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update g_category set CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORDS = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATY_DESC = #{catyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_ORL = #{sortOrl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_SHOW_IN_NAV = #{isShowInNav,jdbcType=BIT}, GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, FILTER_ATTR = #{filterAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SHOW = #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, IS_ENABLED = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PARENT_ID, KEYWORDS, CATY_DESC, SORT_ORL, IS_SHOW_IN_NAV, GRADE, FILTER_ATTR, IS_SHOW, IS_ENABLED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY from g_category where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
